name: Knightly Vengence
description:
GAME BUG HOT FIX. There is a game breaking bug I am working on a permanent fix for. For right now to prevent the game from crashing, please hit the Q button on the keyboard and select SAVE GAME. If you don't do this when you switch to the next level the game will crash. Just do this once to fix that little bug. I will work on a fix in the code.

You are a Knight that has been banished from the realm. An evil Knight is looking to Usurp the throne. He has risen an army of creatures, and minions to help him with his evil goal. Stop him to win the game.
